doc:
Ronald Ward https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ronald_Ward 0 Ronald Ward was a British actor who appeared in more than twenty British films between 1931 and 1956. He was born in Eastbourne in 1901 as Ronald William Ward, and made his screen debut in the 1931 film Alibi. He was married to the actress Betty Baskcomb and was the father of Theo Ward. Ronald_Ward was a_British_actor who appeared in more_than_twenty_British_films between 1931_and_1956 .
